intro.name: Sebastian Šanda
intro.role: Web Developer specializing in modern scalable web apps
intro.description: Passionate about building performant and accessible websites that bring ideas to life. Experienced in JavaScript, React, Node.js, and CSS.

about.content:
I am a frontend developer specializing in React, Next.js, and WordPress. I enjoy working on modern websites and applications that combine clean design with functionality. With more than 7 years of development experience, I am continuously learning and exploring new technologies.
In my free time, I focus on photography, graphic design, and video production, and I also enjoy exploring game development in Roblox Studio with great enthusiasm.

error.notFound: Oops! Looks like this page ran away to grab coffee ☕️
